text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump: Redfield was misquoted, I’ll let him clear it up. 
Redfield: I was quoted accurately. 
Trump: we probably won’t even have coronavirus in the fall. 
Fauci: We absolutely WILL have coronavirus in the fall. 

This was probably the most entertaining of the conferences😂😂
